Text.Page:
Seriously? You want a custom-made pirate hat?

Look, if you don't have a piece of cyasma-infused leather sitting in a bank vault somewhere, there's nothing I can do for you. Even the Invalesco don't bother with it anymore."It so happens, I do!"

Well, well. Been hoarding this somewhere, have you? No, none of my business.

Let's get you that hat. Which color did you want?"Let's see..."

Let me guess: You've found everything but the cyasma-infused leather.

Want my advice? If you haven't found it by now, you're not going to.
